**Executive Summary**: Olympic freeskier Hunter Hess has responded to President Trump's criticism by flashing an 'L' sign, indicating he stands by his statement and loves the USA.

## Context / Background
Hunter Hess, an American Olympic freeskier, has been at the center of controversy after President Trump made remarks about him. The situation has escalated, with Hess facing criticism and backlash.

## Tactical Key Points / Stats Table
| Event | Result | Response |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Trump's Remarks | Negative | 'L' Gesture |
| Hess's Statement | Patriotic | Standing by his words |

> I love the USA and I stand by my statement, I will not back down to criticism.

## What's Next?
The situation is ongoing, with Hess continuing to compete in the Olympics. The reaction to his 'L' gesture has been mixed, with some supporting his stance and others criticizing his actions.
